abstract: New York City Education Dept says Michael Wiltshire will leave his post as principal at Brooklyn's Boys and Girls High School, but will remain at Medgar Evers College Preparatory School; Wiltshire's departure from Boys and Girls is seen as tacit acknowledgment of failure of Mayor Bill de Blasio's plan to turn school around.

headline.print_headline: Principal Leaves One School; Stays at 2nd
headline.main: Principal of Boys and Girls High School Will Leave, Ending Experiment

keywords.value: Boys and Girls High School (Brooklyn, NY)
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Michael Wiltshire, who for two years simultaneously led the school and another in Brooklyn, will step down from his post at Boys and Girls next month.
lead_paragraph: Michael Wiltshire, who for two years simultaneously led the school and another in Brooklyn, will step down from his post at Boys and Girls next month.
